name: Official Lolli-Watch - Yellow (New Flavor)
description:
Take a lick at the lovely Lolli-Watch™!

Comes in 11 flavours that stand out in the club or on the street, perfect for hot sunny days or hot steamy nights.

Features:
It has a digital display with time, day and date settings, a handy stopwatch and an alarm function! With one push of a button you have an indigo coloured backlight too!

Specifications:
Flavour - Yellow
Watch Size - 1.5" x 2.5" 
Strap Length - 9" 
Strap Width - 1"

Free delivery if you live in the U.K! Everywhere else delivery is £3.00
